about_the_game:
In the Worlds of "Rubber Sharks," plunge into the tranquil existence of the sweet Poolside life. This adventure invites you to revel in the bliss of your cherished poolside sanctuary. A relaxing Rubber Sharks Simulator where you just Observe and lay back. The Rubbersharks will float on the Poolwater and you have not to worry about anything anymore... Fintastic, isnt it?

Various Rubber Sharks will join you happily, each with its very own appearance, charm, and sometimes even secrets to uncover.

They Drift lazily on the water's surface, soak up the sun, taking a leisurely dip, or gleefully glide down the slide. A nostalgic melody serenades from the radio.

As night falls, gaze upon the starlit sky. Silence the radio and let the soothing sounds of waves in the darkness lull you into dreams.

With the break of dawn, welcome the azure sky and plunge into the second pool. There's no rush for you.

For in this moment, there's nothing to do but savor the simple joys of life.

Yet, who's to say there aren't more secrets waiting to be discovered? Embrace the unknown, and remember: Everything is just fine.

Here's some cool facts about "Rubber Sharks":


  • - First off, we're talking cutting-edge Unreal Engine stuff, so hold onto your swim trunks for those sweet graphics.
  • - Unlock a whole bunch of shark variations, each with its own quirky flair.
  • - Some of these sharks? Oh, they're cooler than a polar bear in sunglasses. They've got tricks up their fins!
  • - Psst, there might be something sneaky hidden in there, but hey, it's up to you if you wanna go on a mistery investigation.
  • - You can kick back and let the action unfold or dive in headfirst to uncover the secrets.
  • - And get this – the sharks? They make the most adorable squeaky sounds. Like, seriously, it's cute!
  • - Unlock over 40 variations (and we're cooking up more as we speak).
  • - Snap away with the picture mode for your very own album – Instagram, eat your heart out!
  • - Yep, we totally took inspo from the nice rubber duck game, but with a fin-tastic twist.
  • - Oh, and there's a whole treasure trove of surprises waiting to be discovered. So, what are you waiting for? Dive in and let the adventure begin! 🦈🌊

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 x64
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460 or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1650 or AMD equivalent

short_description: Plunge into the tranquil existence of the sweet poolside life with the amazing company of peaceful Rubber Sharks. This adventure invites you to revel in the bliss of your cherished poolside sanctuary. But could there be a mystery hidden in this peaceful scene, or even more?
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Turkish, Vietnamese
